lead_paragraph: Dallas Mavericks coach Rick Carlisle found plenty of positives in his team's performance against San Antonio. His counterpart, Gregg Popovich, could not stomach the Spurs' "awful" and "pathetic" play.

headline.print_headline: Leonard Scores 24 as Spurs Top Struggling Mavericks 96-91
headline.main: Leonard Scores 24 as Spurs Top Struggling Mavericks 96-91
